          <title>
            <string language="en">Change in light and temperature</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ändern Sie im Licht und in der Temperatur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changez dans la lumière et la température</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mude na luz e na temperatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambi alla luce ed alla temperatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλαγή στο φως και τη θερμοκρασία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambie en luz y temperatura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a set-up to investigate the changes in the amount of light and temperature throughout the day.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">day</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">datalogger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light sensor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">temperature sensor</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Installation, um die 
Änderungen in der Menge des Lichtes und der Temperatur während des 
Tages nachzuforschen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que une installation 
étudiait les changements de la quantité de lumière et de 
température tout au long de la journée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação para 
investigar as mudanças na quantidade de luz e de temperatura durante 
todo o dia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto per 
studiare i cambiamenti nella quantità di luce e di temperatura 
durante il giorno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια οργάνωση για να 
ερευνήσει τις αλλαγές στο ποσό φωτός και θερμοκρασίας καθ' όλη 
τη διάρκεια της ημέρας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición para 
investigar los cambios en la cantidad de luz y de temperatura a 
través del día.</string>
          </description>
